description.name: usdcbase
description.tagline: USD Coin base Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto base-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USD Coin base directly on your website
Unique base/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your base/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
